website_summaries.verdict: Minor quirks aside, these socks are an affordable alternative to heated socks warmed with batteries and are warm with and without the heat packets thanks to the wool blend.
pros: Thick, durable socks made with merino wool and unique design – toe pocket designed for inserted foot warmers that provide 6 hours of warmth
cons: Bulky and may not fit with smaller shoes
Though unisex, women find that the sizes run large

customer_reviews.title: Simply Don't Work - Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Strange some of the good reviews these are getting. I had to return the first pair due to poor quality, and I've now used the replacement pair several times while sitting in my tree stand. They are very sloppy fitting (ordered my size correctly) and the pocket for the warmer is only stitched on the sides and not towards the toe end. As a result the holder is very loose when you put your boot or shoe on the warmer packet is pushed, often balled up and forced back of the foot away from the toes. Very disappointing. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: walleyeslayer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall/winter hunting!
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks!!! They are perfect for keeping my toes warm when sitting still in the cold for hours (ie, "hunting")! The pouch fits standard hand warmer packets perfectly, and the soft Merino wool stays warm and comfortable even if my feet sweat. THESE RUN LARGE though... I'm a 10.5-11 shoe size and I'm swimming around in the Large pair, so I'm ordering another pair in Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps toes warm! Very comfortable sock that fits!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable! I have a larger size calf and it fit comfortably and stayed up. * One consideration: the pocket for heat pack could have been closed on one side maybe. Heat pack does slip out during sleeping regularly but I'm up during night anyway so it is not a problem for me I tried using saftey pin but it was uncomfortable. I have a friend that will sew it up for me soon. But great product!
customer_reviews.author: Morrowdad

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these socks to use while white-tail deer hunting in Ohio and Pennsylvania. They are of high quality construction and are warm even without the heat packs. They run a little big in my opinion. I will not be using them as I didn't like how the socks held the hand warmer in place....the hand warmer would move when putting my boot on and the hand warmer would then cause discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: These are loooong socks.
customer_reviews.text: They go up to my knees. So far, I've worn these out hunting twice in 25°-30° weather. They fit well inside my boots without other sock layers and do hold the "hot feet" warmers under their flap. However, my toes still got numb (there could be several reasons for that). I need to experiment with how to insert the warmers in my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: "It's warm in here, Watson!"
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! Was sitting/working in a truck with no heat for a few hours (about 10°F outside). Keeper my toes nice and warm! Was so greatful for the pockets that you could put hand warmers in!
customer_reviews.author: Neal A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! Being a mailman in Chicago in winter with temps in the below zeros -these are a must have! Great product and Amazon is fantastic and was fast and had everything packaged beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my father for Christmas. He has some nerve damage in his feet so they are very sensitive to the cold weather. He absolutely loved them. They keep his feet warm when he is out in the cold. The only negative is that the inserts slip around a bit but overall very satisfied. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I was looking for an alternative to my battery powered, heated socks that weren't working well in the sub-zero temperatures of Mass. this winter. These socks are very comfortable and when used with the heat packs, they are perfectly warm. I was so impressed, the other night at -6'f, my feet were warm and dry, I ordered two more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: The pocket is actually a sleeve. Wish it had one end sewn shut.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: having the toe warmer on top work better than on bottom. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Socks are nice even without the inserts, but they did a good job of holding them.
customer_reviews.author: RBM

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: They do work good and keep my toes warm. Only thing that concerns me is how long the little pocket will stay sewed on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Smith

customer_reviews.title: This pocket sock is the best hunting sock I've ever worn to keep your toes ...
customer_reviews.text: This pocket sock is the best hunting sock I've ever worn to keep your toes warm in cold weather. I Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great for when you're on your feet all day
customer_reviews.text: Father in law loved them. He said they kept him warm all day, but had to take them off before he slept because they put too much pressure on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must in cold weather, where your sitting for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: B.Marcello

customer_reviews.title: They are bulky, warm, and strong.
customer_reviews.text: They are very warm and hold toe warmers well, but they have trouble fitting into smaller shoes, such as those that have a width which is less than EE.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've used these over a year now, they wear well, wash well, and continue to provide the warmth with the (hand sized) warmers of the same brand. I wish they were a bit cheaper. I got mine when they were having a sale on amazon, for about $8.00. I hope they repeat that sale now and then.
customer_reviews.author: HilaryJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these, and after trying them on I'm logging on to buy another pair! For cold feet, I think these are going to be the solution. I had a spinal surgery that has limited circulation to my left foot, and these really seem to be my solution for snowboarding on cold days!
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark Pollitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these when he has to wear his steel toes in winter. They are really thick, too. Check your boot size, these do take a little extra room. (maybe about another half size up, just guessing). You could just wear them around the cabin, too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Herbal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not too good for waders
customer_reviews.text: I probably could have done without the toe warmer socks and just went with the toe warmers which I also purchased
customer_reviews.author: mikecpuguy

customer_reviews.title: If you have cold feet these will keep your feet ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have cold feet these will keep your feet warn up to 9 or 10 hours with a heat pack...
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them. His feet are always cold and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them. His feet are always cold and he now wears these every night and he is warm and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: 't worn these yet but they seem to be very nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven;'t worn these yet but they seem to be very nice socks
customer_reviews.author: Ann Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wool socks.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, toes got a little cold on the deer stand @32 degrees. Comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: jwmshp456

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet warm for hours
customer_reviews.text: I like to sit outside in the winter with a heater blowing on me while I smoke cigars and do work or other things. I have poor circulation in my toes to begin with and these keep my feet warm for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I always freeze my toes when skiing. These are warm, comfortable socks but did not help me much. I have a hard time fitting comfortably in my ski boots if I insert the foot warmers and most times it takes me several tries to get my foot in the boot without having some sort of pressure point that is bothering. I think that only "electric socks" might be the solution for my cold toes when skiing.
customer_reviews.author: Steffi Paschke

customer_reviews.title: Warm, warm, warm
customer_reviews.text: I just received these socks and put them on. These make my feet feel warm and toasty. Very good for people with nerve damage.
customer_reviews.author: GMC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These toe warmer works just as describe. Will be ordering more for Xmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson - he really likes them as he goes snowboarding whenever possible.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good socks. They will take up more room in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good socks. They will take up more room in your shoes/boots, especially when you use the foot warmers with them.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great you can definitely feel the heat just doesn't last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Bren4587

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great, the heaters go onto the toe area and the socks did not make my feet sweet.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for ice fishing!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses the regular size hand warmers in the pocket of the toe. It's been very cold temps and his feet don't get cold on the ice!
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: My foot size is 6. 5 in Women. ...
customer_reviews.text: My foot size is 6.5 in Women. I bought medium sized socks. They were warm but too wide. Ankle kept turning up in front. Wish they had small size available. Planning to return.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer3936

customer_reviews.title: Great sox!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific. Nice and warm, and the heat pack inserts do a great job for when it is really cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: MyTunes

customer_reviews.title: Great for non-stick foot warmers
customer_reviews.text: The socks are particularly good for the non-sticky foot warmers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Karch

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived just as advertised and on time. We have used this type of warmer in the past and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: crump

customer_reviews.title: finally warm toes
customer_reviews.text: After the most brutal winter I have ever experienced in my 67 years, I found these socks just as the winter ended. I haven't used them yet but look forward to warm toes next winter. I like that I can use the warmers on top of my toes instead of trying to position them comfortably in the bottom of my boot. The socks are nice soft Merino wool and are high enough to match my tall Muck Artic Pro boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: No good for skiing. To bulky to fit in boots and do not keep your toes warm (lack of oxygen?). Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Shred

customer_reviews.title: They hold the heat pads in place
customer_reviews.text: These socks are pretty good and hold the heaters without them slipping. It's a little hard to fit in your normal shoes though. The socks are a little bulky plus you have to fit the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Bought for ski boots - works ok
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wear these in my ski boots. The seams line up a little funny and can cause discomfort if they are in the wrong place in the toe box of the boot. Also, the warmer pocket isn't on my toes, it's further back. I and still use them, but the toe warmer being ON the toe (not back towards the top of the foot) would be more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo Gaul

customer_reviews.title: Getting the toe warmers in is a pain,
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I just use the sticky part of tow warmer on the sock. The slot to insert tow warmers does not cut it I will nit repurchase,
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work in a cooler all day this sock and toe warmer help keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.author: pennie clark

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 different size socks
customer_reviews.text: The socks are great, but I received 2 different size socks :( I was away when they arrived and didn't check until I was traveling again and couldn't return them...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are just regular socks and when you put the hand warmer in it is difficult to walk comfortably because of the extra bulk. Works ok while sitting and you can loosen your laces.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very warm and they wear and wash well! I would buy these socks again. They are good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barkman

customer_reviews.title: not one cold toe
customer_reviews.text: These socks are amazing! They go up to the knee and are soft and cushy. I wore them around the lodge in Alaska (which was -18 degrees outside) and they stayed warm and dry. I wore these socks everywhere! Do not use the toe warmers with these socks. They are crap and useless! Get the hand warmers and put them inside the socks (with an inside sock on so as not to get burned) or in the foot pocket. I really think these socks and the hand warmers saved my toes from getting frost bitten.
customer_reviews.author: LAA

customer_reviews.title: They're nice and warm with the heat packs, and fairly warm without them.
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and warm with the heat packs, and fairly warm without them. Noticeable heat lasts about 5 hours with the included packs.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: These was a great purchase! I was looking in all the stores ...
customer_reviews.text: These was a great purchase! I was looking in all the stores for socks like these and couldn't find them, but when I looked on Amazon there they were, just what I was looking for. And they came in women's sizes which was great!!!!! They came in prompt fashion, and in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Brooks

customer_reviews.title: NOT Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I purchased this particular pair is because the product description said that this item is made in the USA. If this is something you care about you should be aware that this may be out of date. The pair I received is clearly marked Made in China. As this was to be a gift for someone who prefers not to buy things made in China I was pretty disappointed. I can't speak to the quality of the product itself since they weren't for me and I haven't worn them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Petro

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret buying!
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s feet are warm for the first time in over 30 years and he doesn’t even need to use the warming packs! These are a must in our home!
customer_reviews.author: Debisue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are probably great for some guy in giant work boots, but I bought them to wear while cycling. They don't fit in any of my shoes, not even my biggest tennis shoes. And they're charging me more than $5 to return them. Wish I had just gone to Dicks or REI to buy socks. You don't need pockets to hold the toe warmers, either. You can get them with stickies that adhere to your socks, which works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: genna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unless you buy shoes/boots way bigger than you wear, they will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, chemical packets do NOTHING!
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, thick, well-made socks. Yippee-skip, I could have gotten THAT anywhere for half the price. What sold me was the LIE that the stupid chemical packets would do a thing. They did NOTHING. I am not saying they were inadequately warm, I'm saying they produced no heat at all! I just got back from four hours of freezing my feet off at the stadium watching my team lose, and as soon as my feet flaw out, I'd like to put one of them right up this company's...! You want nice, thick socks? Fine, buy them. Just don't think the stupid chemical packets will help. If you want extra heat on a cold day, set fire to the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jefferson Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pocket on the top of the foot was pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Big socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks were ordered for a 14 year old girl. The small size was ginormous. Check sizing before ordering. Quality seemed pretty good, but they have never been used.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The batteries didn't put out heat for very long; just a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: the socks come with a pocket for the heat pads which get so red hot through movement that it burns. the socks without the hot packs are great and warm enough. those heat pad things are dangerous in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Julialynn psychic

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was comparing various wool-blend socks, and decided another brand was more what I wanted. However, I had gone too far into the ordering process and instead of backing out of the order, it was processed! I didn't even give the correct password! The percentage of wool in the pair was lower than I wanted. I don't yet know how they worked, as they were a gift for an oil worker & he's out of town. The heat feature also was important, and these socks do have that. Be sure to select what you really want, as the order may go through!
customer_reviews.author: Petes Patter

customer_reviews.title: I would not suggest this product at any price.
customer_reviews.text: Pocket warmers do not stay in place. This information should be included in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

product_meta.title: Heat Factory Merino Wool Pocket Socks for use with Heat Factory Foot and Toe Warmers
product_meta.description: The Heat Factory Pocket Sock in a heavyweight Merino wool blend. The Pocket Sock has a special pocket over the toes to hold Heat Factory Foot Warmers. Simply insert a Foot Warmer packet in the pocket and enjoy 6 hours of soothing warmth. Above calf length. One pair of Heat Factory Foot Warmers included (additional wamers sold separately). Heat Factory's air activated hand warmers, body warmers, toe warmers, and heated accessories have been providing warmth and pain relief to outdoor enthusiasts for the past 30 years.
feature_bullets: Above-calf length Merino Wool Sock provides protection and long-lasting warmth to your feet and legs in cold outdoor activities
Integrated pockets over the toes hold heat warmers; includes two Heat Factory Foot Warmers that last up to six hours each
Medium fits men's US shoe sizes 5-8, women's US shoe sizes 5-10; large fits men's US shoe sizes 9-13, women's US shoe sizes 11-12
Merino Wool Blend: 71% acrylic, 12% Merino Wool, 15% nylon, 1% rubber, and 1% Other Fiber
